context_bundle.summary: PAD datetime actions: Get Current, Add to DateTime, Subtract Dates, Convert DateTime to Text (format patterns), Convert Text to DateTime (parse)

onboarding.quick_start: Get current datetime -> Add 7 days -> Convert to text 'yyyy-MM-dd' for filename timestamp
common_patterns: Get current date and time timezone:Local -> %CurrentDateTime%
Convert datetime to text format:'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' -> %Timestamp%
known_errors: Format pattern case-sensitive: yyyy not YYYY, MM not mm for month
Parse fails if text doesn't match expected format exactly
Timezone conversions can shift dates unexpectedly
